markdownRemark.html: Situated between Alhaurin el Grande and Alhaurin de la Torre and not too far from Malaga City, this golf course is very well maintained and many changes are occurring regularly in order to improve. Lauro golf has 27 holes. The views from this field are stunning and the scenery is magnificent, the golf course is a good test for any handicap. There are two restaurants onsite.

frontmatter.title: Lauro Golf Breaks Apartments

frontmatter.address: Crta. de Málaga a Coín A-404, km 14,  29130 Alhaurín de la Torre (Málaga), Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 70.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 70.00 euros
